TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用物件來指定操作的慣性的行為。You can use the object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation. 您可以使用，分別指定每種類型的操作慣性行為， ，和屬性。You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the , , and properties. 每個屬性是類型的物件，表示慣性的行為和每個案例中，您可以指定下列項目：Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - 慣性開始時的初始速度。The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins. - 操作慣性結束時所要的位置。The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. - 慣性的所需的減速程度。The desired deceleration of the inertia. 此外，您通常會指定操作慣性結束時所需的位置或慣性，但非兩者的所需的減速。You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定為平移、 擴充和旋轉在慣性期間所需的減速程度。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法成功，預設值傳送先前為滑鼠向下、 滑鼠移動，觸控事件或滑鼠向上事件的項目和未來的操作事件不會發生。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ ExpansionBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定展開慣性移動變慢的速率。

span.span: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.

value.span: 展開慣性移動變慢的速率。

span.span: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以執行下列動作：Use the property to do the following: - 一開始先設定時，指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 藉由設定的慣性結束時指定的操作的伸展屬性。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定以指定所需的減速程度的慣性屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常將或，但非兩者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.

The point from which the manipulation originated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多個連絡點啟始操作、屬性是所有其連絡點之間的點。If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the property is the point between all of the points of contact. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以執行下列動作：Use the property to do the following: - 一開始先設定時，指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 藉由設定的慣性結束時指定的操作所需的旋轉屬性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定以指定所需的減速程度的慣性屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常將或，但非兩者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以執行下列動作：Use the property to do the following: - 一開始先設定時，指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定的操作所需的位置，藉由設定的慣性結束時屬性。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定以指定所需的減速程度的慣性屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 您通常將或，但非兩者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 如需有關操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需回應操作的應用程式的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 建立您第一個觸控應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
